description: Installs Chocolatey on a set of targets.

download_url.description: A url that will return `chocolatey.nupkg`. This must be a url, but not necessarily an OData feed. Any old url location will work. Defaults to `'https://chocolatey.org/api/v2/package/chocolatey/'`.

use_7zip.description: Whether to use built-in shell or allow installer to download 7zip to extract `chocolatey.nupkg` during installation. Defaults to `false`

install_proxy.description: Proxy server to use to use for installation of chocolatey itself or `undef` to not use a proxy

seven_zip_exe.description: Path on the windows host where the 7zip binary (7za.exe) is installed. Defaults to `'C:/Windows/Temp/7za.exe'`.
